Text: can u upload vampire diaries s1 complete in mp4 format :) i'll be seeding it forever :)

@Arjunnn: I cannot, 'cause I kept only few episodes (four) from season one. Fans of Vampire Diaries and me... well... haven't be in "good relations".
In fact - highest recorded number of Hit & Runs I had on first dozen episodes of Vampire Diaries - back then on mininova, of course.

I assume that you have nothing to do with that - but when I warn people "do not shit where you eat" - it's about this.

TVD S2 is back ONLY because request of my friend.

thank you for ur reply
ur video quality has been awesom
can i kno which software u use to convert these files so that i can convert these files myself :)

@Arjunnn: I use software written, compiled or modified by - myself. It's highly customized to suit my specific needs. But - you can try Handbrake, it is free and versatile open source program. Not quite good as mine - but has GUI (Graphical User Interface) and it is much easier to use  than strict command-line, as in case of my tool-chain. Many encoders on TPB use HandBrake or MeGUI. Just Google.

Hi 20-40,
Thanks for the encode/upload.

Cheers
Jon

P.S. Thanks for UP'ing this show.

If it is possible can you please make a torrent of the whole of season 2 because the old torrents are not active .. I cannot seed other wise I would have loved to help an awesome person like you who is providing everyone this service !
